description: Documents and research on airport options for London and the Southeast generated under the mayoralty of Boris Johnson

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Historical documents relating to London aviation policy, done for and by us under the previous Mayor, include reports and analysis as well as correspondence. Most of these cover the debate over airport capacity."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The content in many of the documents is still relevant because the Government draws heavily on the work of the Airports Commission in its current case for Heathrow expansion.

Some documents refer to options for new London airports which were supported by the previous Mayor, but are no longer London policy. Read more about Mayor Sadiq Khan's position on the London's airports page .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Airports Commission evidence"}

This report from early 2016 reviews the evidence presented by the Airports Commission Final Report, examines the arguments against an expanded Heathrow making the necessary hub airport and presents the option of a new hub airport located to the East of London.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Landing the right airport","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/landing-the-right-airport.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 8.66MB","image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/landing-the-right-airport-cover.jpg","alt":"Cover of Landing the right airport"}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Further technical evidence"}
Further technical work was done as a follow-up to the Airports Commission Final Report and to feed into the 'Landing at the right airport' document.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Monetisation of aviation noise impacts - April 2016","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/monetisation-of-aviation-noise-impacts.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 190KB","image":{}},{"title":"Noise modelling: Alternative future baseline - March 2016","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/noise-modelling-alternative-future-baseline.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.80MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Responses to Parliamentary committees"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Response to the Transport Select Committee"}

The Transport Select Committee held an inquiry into surface transport at airports. The inquiry examined whether strategic connections to airports fulfil current and future requirements. The then-Mayor submitted evidence to this inquiry.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Mayor of London response to the Transport Select Committee - October 2015","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/mayoral-response-transport-select-committee-surface-access-to-airports-2015.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 122KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Response to the Environmental Audit Committee"}

The Environmental Audit Committee held an inquiry into the implications for Government commitments on carbon emissions, air quality and noise should the Airports Commission's recommendation of Heathrow expansion be adopted. The then-Mayor submitted evidence to this inquiry.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"TfL follow up letter to the Environmental Audit Committee - 18 November 2015","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/follow-up-letter-to-eac-18-nov-2015.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 444KB","image":{}},{"title":"TfL follow up letter to the Environmental Audit Committee  - 4 November 2015","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/follow-up-letter-to-eac-04-nov-2015.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.49MB","image":{}},{"title":"Mayor of London response to the Environmental Audit Committee - September 2015","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/mayoral-response-to-eac-on-ac-sep-2015.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 270KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Response to final recommendation"}
In July 2015, the Airports Commission published its final report, recommending the expansion of Heathrow airport. The then-Mayor and TfL issued a rebuttal of the Commission's recommendation.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"The Mayor's response to the Airports Commission's recommendation for a three-runway Heathrow (October 2015)","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-response-to-airports-commissions-final-recommendation.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.84MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Airport options shortlist response"}

The then-Mayor responded to the Airports Commission consultation on the shortlisted three airport expansion options. Included is a series topic-specific supplementary papers that assessed the Commission's consultation.

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Gateway to our future"}
This report looks at the possible impact of a new hub airport on London and the South East.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Gateway to our future - August 2014","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/gateway-to-our-future.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.38MB","image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/gateway-to-our-future-1.gif","alt":"Gateway to our future report cover"}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL's rebuttal of airport decision"}

In December 2013, the Airports Commission published a report on airport capacity . The then-Mayor and TfL issued rebuttals of the Commission's decision not to shortlist the proposal for an airport hub on the Inner Thames Estuary.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"TfL's rebuttal of the Airports Commission's decision not to shortlist an Inner Thames Estuary option","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/tfl-rebuttal-response.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 227KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Airports Commission Interim Report"}

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Mayor's response to the key issues from the Airports Commission Interim Report - May 2014","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/ac-interim-report-key-issues.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 397KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"The then-Mayor's hub airport proposals"}
When he was Mayor, Boris Johnson promoted three options for a new hub airport serving London located to the east of the Capital.
In July 2013, he submitted detailed technical proposals for each of these three sites to the Airports Commission .

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Enlarging Stansted Airport - July 2013","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/new-hub-airport-stansted-mayor-of-london-july-2013.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 2.06MB","image":{}},{"title":"New outer Thames estuary hub - July 2013","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/outer-thames-estuary-hub-plan-2013.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 2.06MB","image":{}},{"title":"New Isle of Grain (inner Thames estuary) hub - July 2013","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/isle-of-grain-hub-plan-summer-2013.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 2.10MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Inner Thames Estuary study"}

the Airports Commission to keep an Inner Thames
